nodes.text: he is one of the best leaders the USSR could have at this time
Mr Gorbachev is one of the shrewdest and best educated people and one of the people most knowledgeable about the West to be found in this country
If a person is one of the shrewdest best educated people and one of the most knowledgeable about the West to be found in USSR he is one of the best leader the USSR could have at this time
